Class AmazonWebServerNode

java.lang.Object
AmazonWebServerNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class AmazonWebServerNode extends Object implements Runnable
Amazon Web Server Node Receives orders containing (Address, City, State, Zip) Node reads in orders from 'S24_AmazonOrderProcessing_OrdersFile.csv' For each order it receives it will decide which Shipping-Center to send to based on location / logic When node reaches end of file, it WILL (MUST) send some indication to all Shipping-Center Nodes through the shared buffer that the END has been reached and will then terminate

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private Order
    handleOrder(String line)
    Process's Order by line in OrderList [0] street address , [1] city ,[2] state , [3] zip, [4] name, [5] item , [6] category 1234 Iowa Avenue,Denver,Iowa,52234,Jane Doe,Laptop,Computer Use's Order Class to easily take in and return information
    void
    run()
    AmazonWebServer's run(), called when thread is executed in Driver, reads in Orders from input File For each order until the file ends the server will determine which shipping-center each order needs to be sent to It will append the Shipping-Center number to the order Then send (share) the order with the corresponding input buffer for the Shipping-Centers
    int
    whichShippingCenterOne(Order order)
    Returns Integer Value corresponding to which Center the City should point to and appends the number to the Order

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      AmazonWebServer's run(), called when thread is executed in Driver, reads in Orders from input File For each order until the file ends the server will determine which shipping-center each order needs to be sent to It will append the Shipping-Center number to the order Then send (share) the order with the corresponding input buffer for the Shipping-Centers
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      See Also:
      • Order
      • ShippingCenterNode

    • whichShippingCenterOne

      public int whichShippingCenterOne(Order order)
      Returns Integer Value corresponding to which Center the City should point to and appends the number to the Order
      Returns:
      1 if in Center One, 2 if Center Two, -1 if null
